overview:
Bruce Menefield is a technology strategist and entrepreneur. A UK resident originally from the United States, Bruce splits time between New York and London.

Bruce started in the industry at a very young age, taking advantage of the 1990’s tech boom and rapidly rising through the ranks of outsourcing service providers and corporate IT. Bruce gained broad international experience working as a senior IT manager for Arcapita, a Bahrain-based Private Equity firm, until leaving to found Boss Innovations in 2010.
